perturbation.original_text: F. "Licensed Products" shall mean BlackMP Living Water, BlackMP Concentrate, Zezel Probiotic Water, Zayin Sports Water, Gridiron CBD H2O Probiotics™ Water, Gridiron MVP™ and Gridiron MVP™ Concentrate using the Pro Football Legends Logo on the Licensed Products' affixed labels, hang-tags or packaging. Other products of the Company may be added to the list of Licensed Products during the Contract Period by written amendment to this Agreement. All amendments to this Agreement must be signed by all parties to this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: F. "Licensed Products" shall initially mean BlackMP Living Water, BlackMP Concentrate, Zezel Probiotic Water, Zayin Sports Water, Gridiron CBD H2O Probiotics™ Water, Gridiron MVP™ and Gridiron MVP™ Concentrate using the Pro Football Legends Logo on the Licensed Products' affixed labels, hang-tags or packaging. The Company reserves the right to modify or remove products from the list of Licensed Products at its sole discretion, without requiring an amendment to this Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states that other products can be added to the list of 'Licensed Products' only through a written amendment signed by all parties. The modified version allows the Company to unilaterally modify the list, contradicting the original requirement for mutual agreement and creating uncertainty about which products are actually covered by the agreement at any given time.

perturbation.original_text: C. A *donation of $0.05 per Unit sold of Licensed Products within the Contract Territory payable to the **NFL Alumni Northern California Chapter. Donated amounts will be allocated and dispersed to the Northern California Chapter beginning on the first full quarter [three (3) month period] of the Agreement and continue on a quarterly basis thereafter for the term of this Agreement. Where the following per Unit conversion shall apply for the term of this Agreement:
perturbation.changed_text: C. A *donation of $0.05 per Unit sold of Licensed Products within the Contract Territory payable to the **NFL Alumni Northern California Chapter. The company at its discretion may change the allocation and disperse amounts to the Northern California Chapter. Dispersal will begin the first full quarter [three (3) month period] of the Agreement and continue periodically thereafter.
perturbation.explanation: The original text clearly states that amounts donated will be allocated to the NFL Alumni Northern California Chapter. The modified version allows the Company to change the allocation, potentially dispersing the funds to any location at the companies discretion. This creates uncertainty about where the funds will actually go.

perturbation.original_text: The Company will provide to the NFLA-NC upon request the most recent quarterly sales report of the Company's Licensed Products.
perturbation.changed_text: The Company is not required to provide sales reports, except where required by law. Sales data, if provided, is strictly confidential.
perturbation.explanation: The original agreement explicitly states that the Company will provide quarterly sales reports of Licensed Products upon request to the NFLA-NC. The modified version introduces a contradiction by stating the Company is not required to provide these reports, and if they do, they're confidential. This undermines the NFLA-NC's ability to verify donation amounts and creates uncertainty about the level of transparency they will receive.
